# Framework

```{r}
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)

# Define UI ----

# Shiny template from https://github.com/santiagosnchez/genetic_drift
ui <- fluidPage(
    titlePanel("Genetic Drift Simulator"),
    sidebarLayout(
        sidebarPanel(
            numericInput(
                inputId = "population_size", 
                label = "Population Size", 
                value = 100, 
                step = 1), 
            sliderInput(
                inputId = "initial_frequency", 
                label = "Initial Allele Frequency", 
                min = 0, 
                max = 1, 
                step = 0.05, 
                value = 0.50), 
            actionButton(
                inputId = "run", 
                label = "Run"), 
            actionButton(
                inputId = "reset", 
                label = "Reset")), 
            actionButton(
                inputId = "bottleneck", 
                label = "Bottleneck!"), 
        mainPanel(
            fluidRow(
                column(
                    4, 
                    verbatimTextOutput("text")
                    )
                ),
            fluidRow(
                column(
                    8, 
                    plotOutput("pop_plot")
                    )
                ), 
            fluidRow(
                column(
                    8, 
                    plotOutput("freq_plot")
                    )
                )
            )
        )
    )


# Define server logic ----
server <- function(input, output) {
    output$population_size = renderText({
        input$population_size
    })
    
    output$initial_frequency = renderText({
        input$initial_frequency
    })
    
    
}

# Run the app ----
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)



```
